scripts.build: npm -w web run build && npm -w server run build
scripts.lint: biome check scripts server/src server/tests web/src web/vite.config.ts server/playwright.config.ts
scripts.lint:fix: biome check --write scripts server/src server/tests web/src web/vite.config.ts server/playwright.config.ts
scripts.typecheck: npm -w web run typecheck && npm -w server run typecheck
scripts.test:e2e: npm run build && npm -w server run test:e2e
